summary: The Kennedy family is an American political dynasty with Irish roots. It all started with Patrick Joseph "P.J." Kennedy, who was elected to the Massachusetts state legislature in 1884. His grandson, John F. Kennedy, became a U.S. Congressman, and then President. The family has had many members in important roles, like Robert F. Kennedy as Attorney General and Ted Kennedy as a U.S. Senator. They've also been involved in other areas like health and disability advocacy, with Eunice Kennedy Shriver founding the Special Olympics. The Kennedys have been a big part of American politics and public service for many years.
title: Kennedy family
